descriptionHtml:
Sorry, i cannot speak english. using the google translation.

This mod the customized voice will apply for player only.
Relevance of the default voice, you\'ll see \"readme/player_voice_list.txt\".

The voice files that are added when you install this mod, Skyrim thing of default.

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install: (If you have a voice mods already, skip step 2.)

1. Use NMM or Copy the extracted files to \"Skyrim/Data\" folder. (LyPlayerVoice.esp... etc)
2. Download/Install the voice mod you want to apply to the player.
3. Run \"Skyrim/Data/Options/VoiceModConverter/Converter.exe\". (Vista or Win7 user may need to run as administrator.)
4. Click \"Browse\", select the mod folder. You can check the voice type of the mod. (If you have installed, please select the \"Skyrim/Data\" folder.)
5. Conversion is started by click \"Execute\". (If you have already installed This is the end. Mod you have installed, please uninstall if you do not need it.)
6. To \"Skyrim/Data/sound/voice/\" folder, please copy \"ModFolder/Data/sound/voice/LyPlayerVoice.esp\" folder in finished.

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall:

Use NMM or Delete \"Skyrim/Data/LyPlayerVoice.esp\" file, \"Skyrim/Data/readme/\", \"Skyrim/Data/Options/VoiceModConverter/\" and \"Skyrim/Data/sound/voice/LyPlayerVoice.esp/\" folder.

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[youtube]N_QPAesgRFc[/youtube]

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ChangeLog:

v0.1.3
- Bug fix in the tool.

v0.1.1
- Create a tool for renaming, included.
- No change in mod.

v0.1.0b
- initial release.
author: lylion12
